attributes.action: Change the national anthem to the Eric Idle song "always look on the bright side of life"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Some things in life are bad
They can really make you mad
Other things just make you swear and curse.
When you're chewing on life's gristle
Don't grumble, give a whistle
And this'll help things turn out for the best...

    And...always look on the bright side of life...
    Always look on the light side of life... 

If life seems jolly rotten
There's something you've forgotten
And that's to laugh and smile and dance and sing.
When you're feeling in the dumps
Don't be silly chumps
Just purse your lips and whistle - that's the thing.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
